content.rendered:
Hard Coat Protection

Problems with Ordinary Lenses



Problems with Ordinary Lenses



  • Optimum scratch resistance on both sides of lens
  • Dual side hard coating to remove spots and ghost images
  • Reduced dust accumulation
  • Enhanced vision clarity and durability

Texus is the industry reckoned Hard Coat offering from Yash, a benchmark of quality and performance in providing optimum scratch resistance to extend the life of lenses.
